mapper.sql: SELECT S.ID AS SETTING_ID, S.CREATED_AT AS SETTING_CREATED_AT, S.MODIFIED_AT AS SETTING_MODIFIED_AT, S.NEWS_ENABLED AS SETTING_NEWS_ENABLED, S.SOUND_ENABLED AS SETTING_SOUND_ENABLED, U.ID AS USER_ID, U.ENABLED AS USER_ENABLED, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT, U.DOB AS USER_DATE_OF_BIRTDAY, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT, U.VERIFIED AS USER_VERIFIED, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, U.PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD FROM argon.SETTINGS S LEFT JOIN argon.USERS U ON S.USER_ID = U.ID
